nodes.text: Godan-Ur was a male Voss Adjudicator living on Voss during the Galactic War. Around 3640 BBY he presided over a hearing between Republic General Thelonia Redrish, Imperial Ambassador Methias Yoran and the Grand Champion of the Great Hunt. After Redrish defended her position by announcing a pilgrimage to the Shrine of Healing, Godan-Ur determined that the bounty hunter should take the pilgrimage as well.
Godan-Ur appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during a Bounty Hunter class mission on Voss.
